akn:subsection.akn:heading: Authority to make grants or enter into contracts

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Authority to make grants or enter into contracts

(e) Demonstration programs and projects The Secretary may award grants to, and enter into contracts with, entities that are States, Indian tribes or tribal organizations, or public or private agencies or organizations (or combinations of such entities) for time-limited, demonstration projects for the following:
